Safirio Madzikatire, onye a makwaara dịka Mukadota, bụ onye na-ese ihe na-ahụ maka ọtụtụ ihe na-eme ihe ọchị na egwu. Aha njirimara ya sitere na ọrụ ya dịka Mukadota Baba VaRwizi na The Mukadota Family, ihe nkiri Shona TV nke na-agba na Zimbabwe Broadcasting Television (ZTV) n'afọ ndi 1980 na mmalite afọ ndi 1990
